snippet: The British government will announce on Monday that it will take responsibility for all British government debt should Scotland vote to leave the United Kingdom this year, a person familiar with the situation said on Sunday....

headline.print_headline: UK to Make Debt Pledge Ahead of Scotland Referendum: Source
headline.main: UK to Make Debt Pledge Ahead of Scotland Referendum: Source

lead_paragraph: The British government will announce on Monday that it will take responsibility for all British government debt should Scotland vote to leave the United Kingdom this year, a person familiar with the situation said on Sunday.
